signInDescription: Enter your username and password to sign in.
defaultErrorMessage: Something went wrong, please try again again!
unableToSignOut: Unable to Sign Out, please try again later!
itemNameTooltipText: Enter the Item Name below. It's recommended to avoid special characters, and duplicate names are not allowed.
genericNameTooltipText: Enter the Generic Name below. It's recommended to avoid special characters. If the name already exists, please choose from the displayed list.
itemTypeTooltipText: Select the Item Type from the list below.
itemMasterTypeTooltipText: Select Master Type from the dropdown to identify if it is Medicine or another type.
itemCategoryTooltipText: Select the Item Category from the list below.
itemRiskTooltipText: Choose the Item Risk from the options below. This will indicate the medicine risk using the specified colors.
itemReorderQtyTooltipText: Enter the Qeorder Quantity below. This will be used for reorder calculations and will consider the total stock across all outlets.
itemQtyUnitTooltipText: Select the Quantity Unit from the list below. Please note that this will be reflected in bills and other reports / documents.
fillRequiredFields: Please fill in the required fields.
itemRemarksTitleTooltipText: You can add a title below, such as Drug Reaction, Precautions, etc.
itemRemarksDescriptionTooltipText: You can add a description based on the title, such as entering a Drug Reaction description, etc.
switchDarkLightInfoText: Switch On for Dark mode and Off for Light mode.
supplierNameTooltipText: Enter the Supplier Name below. It's recommended to avoid special characters, and duplicate names are not allowed.
gstTooltipText: Enter the GSTIN of supplier below.
licenceNoTooltipText: Enter the Licence Number of supplier below.
emailTooltipText: Enter the Email of supplier below.
mobileNoTooltipText: Enter the Mobile Number of supplier below. It should be 10 digits.
supplierBranchesTooltipText: Select one or more branches from the list. The supplier is only available in the selected branch(es). By default, all branches are selected.
addressLine1TooltipText: Enter the first line of the supplier's Address below.
addressLine2TooltipText: Enter the second line of the supplier's Address below.
zipOrPinCodeTooltipText: Enter the supplier's ZIP / PIN Code below.
mobileNoValidText: Please enter a valid Mobile Number!
zipCodeValidText: Please enter a valid ZIP / PIN Code!
errorGeneratePDF: Unable to generate PDF, try again later.
errorGenerateExcel: Unable to generate Excel, try again later.
itemBranchesTooltipText: Select one or more branches from the list. The item is only available in the selected branch(es). By default, all branches are selected.
taxBranchesTooltipText: Select one or more branches from the list. The tax is only available in the selected branch(es). By default, all branches are selected.
taxNameTooltipText: Enter the tax name below (e.g., GST, VAT, etc.). If needed, you can add sub-taxes by splitting this tax.
taxValueTooltipText: Enter the Tax Value here. You can choose to apply this value as either a Percentage or an Amount in the next field.
taxTypeTooltipText: Select the Tax Type. The tax will be calculated based on this type, either as a percentage or an amount.
subTaxNameTooltipText: You can enter the Sub-Tax Name here, as a split of the main tax.
subTaxValueTooltipText: You can enter the Sub-Tax Value here as a split of the main tax, and you can select either a percentage or an amount in the next field.
subTaxTypeTooltipText: You can select the Sub-Tax Type, either percentage or amount, from the list. It will be calculated as a split of the main tax amount.
subTaxSumError: Sub-tax values must sum to the main tax value.
subTaxTypeError: Sub-tax type must match the main tax type.
purchaseEntryBranchTooltipText: The logged-in Branch is automatically selected and cannot be changed. To add a purchase entry for another Branch, you must log in to that Branch.
purchaseEntryOutletTooltipText: You can select an Outlet from here. If an Outlet is selected, it will automatically apply to the entry items, but you can change it item-wise if needed. Outlets are shown under the selected branch.
purchaseEntrySupplierTooltipText: Select a Supplier from here. If the Supplier is not in the list, you need to add it first.
purchaseEntryFormTypeTooltipText: Select the required Form Type for importing/exporting controlled substances in compliance with regulations from the list.
purchaseEntryTypeTooltipText: Select your Purchase Type (e.g., Ayurvedic, Dental, etc.).
purchaseEntryOrderNumberTooltipText: Enter your Purchase Order Number if you have one.
purchaseEntryInvoiceNumberTooltipText: Enter the Invoice Number for your purchase.
purchaseEntryInvoiceDateTooltipText: Input the Invoice Date for your purchase. You cannot enter a future date.
purchaseEntryDateTooltipText: You can enter the Purchase Entry Date, including past dates. The default date will be today, and if you leave it empty, today will be considered.
purchaseEntryTaxableAmountTooltipText: This is the total Taxable Amount of the added items.
taxableAmountEmpty: Taxable Amount can not be empty!
purchaseEntryNonTaxableAmountTooltipText: This is the total Non Taxable Amount of the added items.
nonTaxableAmountEmpty: Non Taxable Amount can not be empty!
selectedTaxSplitSubText: If taxes are selected, the splits will be visible here.
customDatesTooltipText: Select a custom date range by entering the number of days here. Use a positive number for future dates and a negative number (with '-') for past dates. If no start date is selected, the range will default to start or end from today. If a date is selected, the range will start or end from that date.
dateRangeTooltipText: The data list will display based on the selected date range, using greater than or equal to, and less than or equal to the range. By default, today is set as both the start and end date.
